commit message:
Boilr now retries to get last value in Price Change alarms. Fixes #35.
No internet notification display is now controlled by a boolean.
Definitely fixes #20.
Increased version number.

Added exchanges: BitBay, Bitcurex, BitMarket.pl, Crypto-Trade,
Cryptonit, Justcoin and Paymium.
Removed Mintpal exchange.
Added release description to POM.

Added czech language.
Added language selection to application settings.
Changed formatter to process numbers only with dots instead of comma.

Minor corrections to formatters and Engineering Notation.
Added CCEDK exchange.
Added missing donation addresses and translation authors to README.
PriceHitAlarms now getting last value as soon as they are created. This
makes alarm creation more responsive.
Added exchanges: Atomic Trade, C-CEX, CoinMkt, Coins-E and Vircurex.
Fixed activities' title not changing when language is changed.

Added setTitle to NotificationActivity.
AlarmListActivity now restarts when language is changed.
Reverting use of boolean in no internet notification.
Removed unecessary language verification before creating a notification.
